author: Olivia
title: Buffalo Cauliflower Tacos
ingredients: ¼ cup ranch or blue cheese dressing
Optional toppings: avocado (chopped cilantro, red onion, lime wedges)
instructions_list: Toss cauliflower florets with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet.
Roast for 20–25 minutes, until golden and tender.
Remove from oven and toss with buffalo sauce.
Warm tortillas in a skillet or microwave.
Fill each tortilla with lettuce, buffalo cauliflower, and your favorite toppings.
Drizzle with ranch or blue cheese dressing. Serve warm.
description: Spicy buffalo cauliflower tacos with crunchy lettuce and creamy ranch. A tasty, meat-free recipe ready in 35 minutes—perfect for taco night or a light dinner!
